Fingerprint recognition: Fingerprints are unique to each individual and can be used as a form of identification. In the absence of other forms of identification, fingerprint recognition could be used to prove who you are.
DNA testing: DNA testing can be used to identify individuals and could be used as a form of identification in the absence of other forms.

Voice recognition: Voice recognition technology can be used to identify individuals based on their unique vocal patterns. In the absence of other forms of identification, voice recognition could be used to prove who you are.

Retinal scanning: Retinal scanning can be used to identify individuals based on the unique patterns in their retinas. In the absence of other forms of identification, retinal scanning could be used to prove who you are.

Facial recognition: Facial recognition technology can be used to identify individuals based on their unique facial features. In the absence of other forms of identification, facial recognition could be used to prove who you are.
